ReleaseNotes:
## JubileeBrowser 8.0.7

### What's New
- Professional MSI installer for easy deployment
- Improved installation experience with Windows shortcuts
- All files from 8.0.6 plus installer improvements

### Previous Features (8.0.6)
- Platform migration from Electron to .NET 8 WPF
- Self-contained deployment (no .NET installation required)
- WebView2 engine for modern web rendering
- Enterprise-ready MSI installer support
- Auto-update system with SHA256 verification
- Secure credential storage via Windows Credential Manager
- Tab groups and session persistence
- Content filtering with 309,000+ blocked sites

See https://jubileebrowser.com/releases for full release notes.

## JubileeBrowser 8.0.6

### What's New
- Platform migration from Electron to .NET 8 WPF
- Self-contained deployment (no .NET installation required)
- WebView2 engine for modern web rendering
- Enterprise-ready MSI installer support
- Auto-update system with SHA512 verification
- Secure credential storage via Windows Credential Manager
- Tab groups and session persistence
- Content filtering with 309,000+ blocked sites

See https://jubileebrowser.com/releases for full release notes.
